content.description:
Find the gulley on the left side of the buttress, and continue up it.

Pitch 1: Smaller gulley leading up and left to a small hole, continue through hole and set up a belay.

Pitch 2: Go up one of three cracks around a large face, probably crux pitch at around 5.7.

Pitch 3: Continue up thin gulley until rope drag is too bad.

Pitch 4: Continue up gulley until it cliffs out, then head up left to the summit.

Pitch 5/6: Traverse on the ridge until you can rap left.

Rappel: Slung horn and tree to the left of the ridge.
content.protection: 60 m rope, lots of slings, cams .5-3, some nuts.
content.location: Find the gulley on the left side of the buttress, and continue up it.
